7#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_REWRITECASEDECLARATIONS_H_
8#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_REWRITECASEDECLARATIONS_H_
9
10#include "common/angleutils.h"
11#include "compiler/translator/Compiler.h"
12
13namespace sh
14{
15
16// EXAMPLE
17// switch (expr)
18// {
19// case 0:
20// int x = 0;
21// break;
22// case 1:
23// int y = 0;
24// {
25// int z = 0;
26// }
27// break;
28// }
29// Becomes
30// {
31// int x;
32// int y;
33// switch (expr)
34// {
35// case 0:
36// x = 0;
37// break;
38// case 1:
39// y = 0;
40// {
41// int z = 0;
42// }
43// break;
44// }
45// }
46ANGLE_NO_DISCARD bool RewriteCaseDeclarations(TCompiler &compiler, TIntermBlock &root);
47
48} // namespace sh
49
50#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TRANSLATORMETALDIRECT_REWRITECASEDECLARATIONS_H_
51
